body_html:
@yaroslavvb Thanks. I am new to the bazel. Could you show me how to bazel run the target?
What I tried is to clone the /models to /tensorflow/tensorflow and then go to /models/tutorials/embedding and do the command: bazel build :gen_word2vec. Then I got an error:

ERROR: error loading package 'tutorials/embedding': Extension file not found. Unable to load package for '//tensorflow:tensorflow.bzl': BUILD file not found on package path.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.061s

body:
@yaroslavvb Thanks. I am new to the bazel. Could you show me how to bazel run the target? 
What I tried is to clone the /models to /tensorflow/tensorflow and then go to /models/tutorials/embedding and do the command: bazel build :gen_word2vec. Then I got an error: 

ERROR: error loading package 'tutorials/embedding': Extension file not found. Unable to load package for '//tensorflow:tensorflow.bzl': BUILD file not found on package path.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.061s
